channel.title: Need help with 508 coding, nothing special
channel.description: Uhmm, my ip changer i have for my source shows d claws as, rune claws, how can i simply change this too the dragon claw look.

item.title: Need help with 508 coding, nothing special
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

item def

public void newItem(String name, int dropModel, int maleModel, int maleArms, int femaleModel, int femaleArms) { aRSString_362 = Class112.method1668(43, name);//Item Name anInt330 = dropModel;//inventory/drop model anInt390 = maleModel;//Male model id anInt347 = maleArms;//extra model anInt344 = femaleArms;//extra models anInt387 = femaleModel;//female } public void zoom(int zoom, int rotation1, int rotation2, int offset1, int offset2) { anInt336 = zoom;//model zoom anInt389 = rotation1;//modelRotation1 anInt395 = rotation2;// model rotation 2 anInt358 = offset1;// model offset 1 anInt391 = offset2;// model offset 2 }

applet_sub1

case 3101: class19.aRSStringArray340[1] = Class112.method1668(43, "Weild"); class19.newItem("Dragon claws", 14998, 14997, -1, 14997, -1); class19.zoom(738, 245, 80, -2, 3); break;

i dont spoonfeed so dont ask me to help any further
